page.title: 17POSTAL SERVICES
page.content: The post to these villages are delivered from the Postal Sorting Office in Beech Avenue,Willerby. The workforce consists of 6 full time and 12 partime staff.2 delivery vans based at Beech Avenue are used mainly for parcel post and letters to remote houses and farms. The are 21 delivery rounds split into an early morning and a mid-morning session. The total number of delivery points in this area is 7428 and 4 post offices. 17 rounds are covered by postmen on cycles 2 by postmen on foot and 2 by vans. Postmen start very early at 5.25 am. and have to sort out their mail before going on the round.The postmen finish at 1.07 pm.at the latest. information supplied by Mr R.Drewery ( Counters and Rural Branch,Hull)
